content: Is there a. Active text bank?  Has a texter channel been added?
you can also find more info on the slack! https://txt.democrats.org/SlackJoin

We're moving over to the Discord and away from the Slack, so the best way to get involved with our text team program is to sign up for one of the text team trainings: https://events.democrats.org/event/654680/
For those who already did the text training, when will we be able to start texting?
I took the text team training on July 27. Do I have to go to another text team training for what's moving over to Discord? How do I get added to a texting campaign? Thank you!
I also took the training session on July 27 and I am not able to access the text channels. Please advise. Thanks!
same. I attended the training on the 27th but not able to access text channels. I was added to one yesterday as view only, but it looks like that channel (or maybe just me) was removed
Hi all, let me add you to the texting channels.
I also attended the training on the 27th but do not have access to the text channels.
I signed up for slots August 10th 6-7pm and August 3rd 6-7 pm
I did the text training as well and do not have access
Could I please get into the text channels also? I also trained 7/27.
Please add me as well!  I trained on the 27th
Same i attended and thought i was added to the channel (but I couldn’t take any action) but now it’s missing completely. Appreciate your help!
Please add me as well I took the training on Saturday
I also took the training. What do I need to do to get on the text channels?
Me too, took training 7/27, channel "Text Channels:68" has lock icon and unaccessable to me. I added the channel to my list of channels, but still locked.
Same
I also trained on the 27th, please add me as well. Thank you!
Alright all, you should all be added!

What would we see change? "
"Text Channels:" still has locked icon and doesn't respond.
I would try reloading or closing the app and reentering to see if it reloads with new permissions
Thx, I quit + relaunched Safari, no change.
Most of you but 2 have the role text team so I would see if you can see <#1259238714157305936>
You might have to scroll all the way down to see the text channels. Even though I was added to text channels, I still see the locked icon at the top.
Got it, now Text Team shows up in sidebar 🙂
hmm I see text channels (68) at the top but it's locked!
You don't have the role text team so <@1257469301435400238>
i'll try logging out bc closing the app didn't quite work!
okay kristin just gave you the role
that worked, thank you!
That's great.
Hello I'm following up I had text training on Saturday, but not yet added to a channel.  I see the Text channels listed with the locked icon.....thanks for any help you can provide
added
Hi! I also attended Saturday's text team training, and am waiting to see the texting channels in Discord. Would you be able to add me to these channels, please? Thanks
disregard I see I've been added <@477560366432256000>
I completed the text training.  I thought I was added to the channel, but it is actually showing locked for me, so I cannot respond.

II also took training on the 27th. I can access the texting-campaingns channels now, but there is nothing there , but a welcome message.  Are we only texting during the training sessions and do we have to sign up each time?
No we're sending texts but mostly not on discord at the moment. But I don't know how soon but <@1257469301435400238>
Thanks. So how do we get access to the texts? I have Spoke, but we were told to check here for the text campaigns.
You would have access to texts in a private channel.

I am really confused as it seems many are.  What private channel? And how do we access that? On saturday, we set up our spoke accounts and the discord account and were then able to text. My understanding is that we were to watch this space for future texting opportunities. Where should I be looking?
You should see 5 private channels. But <@1257469301435400238>
I do not have that.  I guess I will have to sign up for another training.
You shouldn't need to do that. But <@1257444318222876712> and <@1252341090892120162> Know you're on the training.
Thanks.

I need another text training. Tonight's was a debacle unfortunately. Completely unclear, trainer unaware of the audience and didn't give an intro. I can't remember where I signed up for that training. Please help

For what it's worth I did a call training on Saturday night and that was equally unhelpful. I signed up to make calls, and the trainer was only looking for team leaders, not people to make calls. Love the enthusiasm but it's a bit disorganized.
I have a link for you to make you calls and we're so helpful. It's https://txt.democrats.org/SKZPB
Did training on 27th … when will we start?
Thank you I signed up for one of those. Fingers crossed
Those are the best. I'm a call mod myself. And we have a lot of mods there.
I made calls in 2020. But I'm sure plenty has changed. For instance Discord instead of slack
We use the scale to win dialer. And it's way better.

Yes tonight's training talked about that, and everyone signed up, and the page was blank :-(. And nothing more was explained. So, still looking for text bank training. Can find it on events.democrats.org. I plan to phone and text and do stuff locally, or at least have all 3 choices for how to volunteer
Please add me to the texting channel. I also attended the text training on the 27th. Thanking you in advance.
<@1266879793484267545> you’re in the channel rn oh wait wrong one.

I did the training on 7/27, but still don’t have any texting channels.  The link you sent me to ask questions is “no access.”  I’d love to be able to start in between working on the DNC special projects petition reviews.  Sorry if I’m being a pain.  Slack seems so much easier than this platform.
<@1257469301435400238> can get you the tag in the morning
lol I am still awake and working so <@456226577798135808> you have the tag now
Thank you!
you are welcome!
<@430470599064682507> Thank you!  I’m ready to get to work!!
Thank you!<:blueheart:1252803082849488956>
I also did the training on 7/27 and still don’t have access to any text channels! Whenever it’s convenient for anyone could I please get added too?
I took the training tonight at 8!
Still not able to access. Text channels has a lock icon and the texting-campaigns still has a welcome message. I have trying shutting down and restarting. Thanks for any help.

Hi. I was in the text training last night but can't get into scale to win, it says I need an invite. And I can't access the text channels. I sent an email to the event organizer but haven't heard back. Thank you
<@1257469301435400238> I signed up for August 3rd @ 6-7 pm first time texting for a campaign
Need to be added to the text channel. Did the training last night. Thanks.

I will absolutely not be doing that. That was incredibly frustrating. Either I need to be added to the channel as promised or I will find something else to do. There's no way in hell I'm sitting through that again.
I did the training yesterday and would like to be added to the texting group.  TIA
Staff will add you soon. Please be patient.
you have the role so you should be able to see it

Thank you for your patience, but everything under text team still has a lock. I saw another comment somwhere that they haven’t posted any campaigns under texting-campaigns and others say they are in.  I really want to do this, but have been trying since Sunday and I keep getting different answers. it was super easy once we were in during the Saturday training.

Hi Brook! Currently the text training events are the only time text campaigns are running so you're not missing anything yet. Staff is still working toward getting regular text campaigns up and running. I did notice the permissions on some channels for the text team category have changed as we tidy up the server.
Where will text banks be noted?  In <#1245442010609881140> welcome or <#1267965766288801872> or...?
Thank you!
It is a private channel at the moment as we tidy up (hold tight for the big reveal) and it is called texting campaigns (but you can't see it at the moment). Wait for the beat to drop! 😉
What happened to all the threads in the text channel
They are just private as we tidy up the server for a big reveal.
Great thanks for all your work!
Please add me as well- have been waiting since the 27th. Thank you!

Hi <@1266879328763908143> - Apologies for the confusion, and thanks for your patience and we work on moving things over from Slack to Discord! You should have access to the private text team chanels now (texting-announcements, texting-questions, texting-campaigns, and texting-nice-things). We have not posted any text campaigns in Discord yet, but hoping to get it up and running by next week! Keep an eye on the texting-announcements channel for updates, and the links will be posted in texting-campaigns. Let me know if that helps!
@p_weston Thanks! Have you taken a text team training yet this past week?
<@1266900496770400339> Thanks! It looks like you've been added to the text channels now - let me know if you don't see it.

<@1035293947125317703> Thank you for your patience! You should be added to the texting channels now - please let me know if you don't see them on your sidebar. We have not posted any text campaigns in Discord yet, but hoping to get it up and running by next week! Keep an eye on the texting-announcements channel for updates, and the links will be posted in texting-campaigns. Let me know if that helps!
<@1266771108980326481> That's great - thanks! We'll see you at the August 3rd training!

<@1266204943602421771> Hi Erin - thanks! It looks like you're in the texting-channels now. For help with Scale to Win, can you please post a question in the <#1259238714157305936> channel and someone can help you over there tomorrow?
<@790705489414586409> <@1256039306129313892> Hi! Thanks for joining - it looks like you are both in our texting channels now. Let me know if you don't see them on your sidebar.

Hi <@1105924482415202446> We have not posted any text campaigns in Discord yet, but hoping to get it up and running by next week! Keep an eye on the texting-announcements channel for updates, and the links will be posted in texting-campaigns. Let me know if that helps!
Thanks for the update Nicole….and your help! I can see all those channels now, but several still have a lock icon on them.  Will that change next week when you add campaigns?
Can you view the channel if you click on it? Some channels are staff and mod announcements only but can be viewed. And some have a lock icon but you can still chat once assigned a role for it.
Thanks! Ah good question -- as long as you can click on them, you're good! They have a lock icon on the left because it shows they're a private channel (instead of a public channel)
Yes, but it just has a welcome message that hasn’t changed in a week.

I can click on it, but it is the same welcome message that has been there for a week. I am on the training call again tonight and I see several other people on there that seem to be having the same problem
Never mind. Stacey said that you aren’t posting campaigns until next week.
Never mind. Stacey said you aren’t posting campaigns until next week.
Hi, <@935762347753103382> I went last week, too and I see there are 135 Text Channels with a LOCK next to them. Could I please be added? This is not my first request. Thank you.
Hi Dana you have the Text Team role so you will be able to access those channels when they are ready. Text team is working on readying everything for the coming week.
I think that means that's there's 135 members already in the texting channels.
No it means there are 135 channels you can't access (likely because they are moderator only channels, or for programs that you aren't in, for ex).
Thank you for the question though, I am sure it is confusing 🙂
Thank you for your reply, I will keep an eye out for text opportunities on here. 💙
I thought I was added yesterday (took training, etc July 27th) but today I don't see the text channels.  My discord account is discuscarl7_32308.  Can someone check?  Thanks
Ok Thanks, Jack.
<@935762347753103382> Do I have to take a text training or test or will I be added. I was in the Victory 2024 slack texting
You don't need to take a quiz we'll add you when we got a chance.
I did the text training in the end of July. I am in the text welcome channel, but that is it. People are talking about texting-campaigns. Can I be added to that?
They are onboarding as quick as they can. The Text Team will have you added usually within a couple days. If not, let us know how long it's been!
Thanks. Happy to wait, just seemed like I might have been accidentally skipped. Tomorrow will be two weeks. I can hold tight though.
Two weeks since finishing the training and coming to the server? <@477560366432256000>can likely help with this. 🙂
If you did the form I can.
Yes. It was the 27th of July. I did the form during the training.
She did the form July 27th. 🙂
Hi <@1266215910276862054> Thanks! It looks like you're in the text team channels (not sure if Jack just added you, or you were in there already!)
Thank you!!!!!
I added her.
Hello I’m looking for the text form
Check your direct mesage.
Could I have the Google form resent to me as I think I never got it after completing text team training?

For Campaign ID: 23185, Teri EIsner VAN ID: 113200167 - External ID: 113200167 replied "When Harris replies to my email I’d be happy to host one for a nonprofit I run that has over 16,000 members" Should I refer them to someone or just provide the link for the information session?
You can say. I'm only a volunteer. But you can contact us here: https://democrats.org/contact-us/
Thank you!
I actually asked you to put this in the wrong space. Can you next time put it in <#1259238714157305936>

How should I answer this one> (Very surprised about this reply- might not be real): Campaign ID: 23185 Jerry Aldrich VAN ID: 113058130 - External ID: 113058130 "I wish you well. I was with her, however since she picked mr. Waltz I believe I'll stay out of this one.."
You can close and save.
My mom is looking to get involved in texting for Kamala - can someone help me point her in the right direction to get started?
It’s at capacity.

<@824899818802380800> Yes -- currently at capacity. You can keep an eye on this link if there are any available spots (i.e. people cancel last minute) or if we add more trainings https://events.democrats.org/event/654680/
Would love to join this text team, Im on the Newsom one, and I have some issues with the homeless spots as of late...
Thanks! Same thing as above -- keep an eye on the link to see if more trainings open up, or if someone cancels their spot last minute and an available spot opens up!
Will do!

Hi, can someone please help me get access to the text team channels? I went to the training on 7/27 with Angelo and am already on Discord and ScaleToWin since that day, but I don't have access to the text team Discord channels (well I can read <#1266829704204386334> but can't post there or view any of the others). BTW I see mention of a Google form in other replies and I don't think I ever saw that or completed it. Thank you 😀
Hi <@797179680075415572> Yes! Sorry for the delay. Will send you a message now (look at the top left for a notification, if you’re on a computer)
(Let me know if you don't see the message from me)

<@935762347753103382> I have to same issue as Dave (above) - I haven't been added to anything after going to the Angelo? zoom. I kind of give up each day on this but want to give it one more try to finally get sorted out. Any help would be welcome. Thank you
<@1265085297188802705> Can you please update your display name and due to an situation which I can't share any of it you'll be added at an later time.
I've updated it. Can you possibly give a ballpark on when that "later time" is? Like days/weeks? Thank you.
At this time I couldn't say. Maybe a week. I don't realy have a general timeframe.
Bizarro since I filled out the google form during the zoom and texted that day. I guess I'll check back eventually 👍🏼 thanks for your help/the info

Hey Ivy - thanks for filling out the Google Form, and apologies for the delay! We are updating our onboarding process right now, which is why there’s a slight delay. Hopefully you’ll be added to the texting channels within the next few days. Sorry for the confusion, and thanks so much for being here! Keep an eye on your DM’s in Discord later this week

My mom wants to get involved in a text bank, but I don’t think she’ll be up for learning discord AND a text platform - is there a way I can get her involved?  She’s a retiree and has time 🙂 …  (I’m a Kamala Facebook community moderator.)

Hello! I attended the text training on 8/7 but haven’t been added to channels. I suspect it’s because my screen name was not my full name until yesterday when I realized the issue. Is it possible to get added?
We’ll add you when we can. We have to update the onboarding process. I don’t know when we can add you sorry.

Hi, I believe I saw this in previous posts but I completed the text training as well with Angelo last week. My wife and I both attended, filled out the forms, joined the discord, and texted that night. However, since the initial night - she has continued to receive requests to text and been included in onboarding, but mine has fallen off with no requests or access to the proper Discord channels. 

From reading through the posts, it seems like this is an issue for others and I understand the delay - but wanted to put my name out there as well to help if needed and to please add me to the channels so I can assist. Thank you for all you do!
So right now we're redoing our procedure for on boarding nothing on your fault or end. But hopefully in the next week we should add you.
Thanks Jack for the follow up!
If someone is already texting on Slack is this training necessary?
Hi <@303677810109841419> Nope not required! We'll be moving all texters from Slack to Discord soon.

I guess I onboarded in the middle of the transition from slack. A few days of waiting,  I ended up signing onto newsom’s pac to text.   Recognize a lot of names from FL and National 2020 over there.   Yesterday a mod posted here that text team was full through Nov - should I check back here?  Tons of campaigns over there, but I’m not sure if texting Arkansas for vol candidates is most effective
Hey Rod! I see you just filled out the original agreement form. I'll send you a DM now (look on the top left in Discord for a notification).
Thanks - I will fully admit I stalled too long to submit the form 🙈
Hello, I was previously added to the text team but have been removed. Can I be added back. Thank you!
Did you fill out the form?
I was not given a form. I was added after the first text training.
So you didn't see an form in texting announcements since Wednesday.

I did the text training a couple weeks ago and filled out the form while everything was migrating to discord but now I don't have the channels with the campaigns, like I did last week. Can someone help me get access back?
Did you fill out the new agreement form and take the quiz?
When Will I get access to the other Text-Team Channels? All I have access to is the text-team-welcome channel.
Thanks! No updates yet for Slack texters (texting will still continue in Slack until we move folks over, so you won't be missing out on anything!)
I do not have a texting announcements channel. I have the welcome channel and this one. And no I have not seen the form in either.
Have you taken the quiz or agreement form?
Hi, I am interested in joining the text team. How do I sign up?
sign up for the orientation class!   https://events.democrats.org/event/654680/
Thank you Rod. I signed up.
